comment: Professor Kelly-Jackson is a little rough around the edges and hard to connect with. However, her class is relevant and gives a lot of content that will be useful in the teaching field. She provides a lot of lesson and lab ideas.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Relevant professor who is down to earth

Literally one of the best classes I took at Kennesaw State for the Education program. She understands the stress you are under and can relate to you in everyway. As long as you put in a lot of effort, she will see that shine through! HIGHLY REC. TO TAKE HER
I took this online. There were SOOO many group projects throughout the semester, including group papers. She seemed like a nice lady and didn't grade too harshly. Good luck with your group members!
One of the best professors I have ever had. She is very knowledgeable in science but fun and real at the same time. I would suggest you take her if you get the chance, she is amazing!
